Roller Derby Rules Project

Client: Arizona Derby Dame Regulators
Completed: 2023

A collaborative project created for the 2023 Roller Rage tournament, designed to help skaters transition from WFTDA to RDCL rulesets.

The Challenge

Create effective training materials with limited resources for skaters learning new rule systems.

Solution Approach

Developed an accessible online learning module using Articulate Rise to explain ruleset differences.

Results

Successfully helped skaters transition between different derby rule systems for the tournament.

Technologies & Methods Used

Articulate Rise Technical Writing Sports Education
